snippet.title: Candle Wood - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Candle Wood is a new indie 2D platformer game available on Steam and Itch.io! Download it now and explore this world full of mysteries and candle folks!

#indiegame #handdrawing #platformer #LamphshadeAnthology #CandleWood #gamedevelopment
